snippet: At a summit meeting on civil rights in Austin, Tex., former President Jimmy Carter cited mistreatment of women and disadvantages among blacks as today’s key civil rights issues.
abstract: Pres Jimmy Carter, speaking at summit meeting on civil rights in Austin, targets mistreatment of women for the next front in the movement, calling for a multifaceted attack against abuses from pay discrimination in the workplace to rape on college campuses and global sex-trafficking of women and girls.
lead_paragraph: At a summit meeting on civil rights in Austin, Tex., former President Jimmy Carter cited mistreatment of women and disadvantages among blacks as today’s key civil rights issues.

headline.main: Speaking at Rights Event, Carter Deplores Disparity
headline.print_headline: Speaking at Rights Event, Carter Deplores Disparity
